demoCode.s:
<view>
    <view class="preview-caption">默认文案：</view>
    <view class="preview-section">
        <gov-agree bindchange="checkdChange" checked="{{value}}"/>
    </view>
    <view class="preview-caption">显示自定义的文案：</view>
    <view class="preview-section">
        <gov-agree bindchange="checkdChange" checked="{{value}}">
            <view slot="text">我已阅读并接受《用户服务协议》</view>
        </gov-agree>
    </view>
    <view class="preview-caption">自定义样式：</view>
    <view class="preview-section">
        <gov-agree
            gov-agree-desc="gov-agree-desc"
            bindchange="checkdChange"
            checked="{{value}}"/>
    </view>
</view>

events.name: change
events.description: 组件中选中项发生改变时触发的事件

externalClasses.name: gov-container
externalClasses.description: 阅读并接受的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变阅读并接受的样式，如背景颜色、宽高等

externalClasses.name: gov-agree-desc
externalClasses.description: 阅读并接受的字体扩展样式类，可通过此class改变阅读并接受的字体的样式
